name: Microsoft SharePoint Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 Microsoft SharePoint Tool 节点。主要用于: Interact with Microsoft SharePoint API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Interact with Microsoft SharePoint API | (必填项)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: file

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: getAll
available_options: Get (值: get) - Retrieve details of a single list
Get Many (值: getAll) - Retrieve a list of lists

site.name: site
site.description: Select the site to retrieve lists from
site.natural_language_description: 参数名: Site | 作用: Select the site to retrieve lists from | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

folder.name: folder
folder.description: Select the folder to upload the file to
folder.natural_language_description: 参数名: Parent Folder | 作用: Select the folder to upload the file to | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

file.name: file
file.natural_language_description: 参数名: File | 作用: Select the file to update | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

fileName.name: fileName
fileName.description: The name of the file being uploaded
fileName.natural_language_description: 参数名: File Name | 作用: The name of the file being uploaded | (必填项)

changeFileContent.name: changeFileContent
changeFileContent.description: Whether to update the file contents
changeFileContent.natural_language_description: 参数名: Change File Content | 作用: Whether to update the file contents | 默认值: False | (必填项)

fileContents.name: fileContents
fileContents.description: Find the name of input field containing the binary data to upload in the Input panel on the left, in the Binary tab
fileContents.natural_language_description: 参数名: File Contents | 作用: Find the name of input field containing the binary data to upload in the Input panel on the left, in the Binary tab | 提示: The name of the input field containing the binary file data to upload | (必填项)

list.name: list
list.description: Select the list you want to retrieve
list.natural_language_description: 参数名: List | 作用: Select the list you want to retrieve | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

noticeUnsupportedFields.displayName: Due to API restrictions, the following column types cannot be updated: Hyperlink, Location, Metadata
noticeUnsupportedFields.name: noticeUnsupportedFields
noticeUnsupportedFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Due to API restrictions, the following column types cannot be updated: Hyperlink, Location, Metadata

columns.name: columns
columns.natural_language_description: 参数名: Columns | 默认值: {'mappingMode': 'defineBelow', 'value': None} | (必填项)

item.name: item
item.description: Select the item you want to get
item.natural_language_description: 参数名: Item | 作用: Select the item you want to get | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

simplify.name: simplify
simplify.natural_language_description: 参数名: Simplify | 默认值: True

filter.name: filter
filter.description: The formula will be evaluated for each record. More info.
filter.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filter by Formula | 作用: The formula will be evaluated for each record. More info. | 提示: If empty, all the items will be returned

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 50

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: fields (值: None) - The fields you want to include in the output

requestOptions.name: requestOptions
requestOptions.natural_language_description: 参数名: Request Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: allowUnauthorizedCerts (值: None) - Whether to accept the response even if SSL certificate validation is not possible
proxy (值: None) - HTTP proxy to use. If authentication is required it can be defined as follow: http://username:password@myproxy:3128
timeout (值: None) - Time in ms to wait for the server to send response headers (and start the response body) before aborting the request
